extendedInfo.description: **THIS IS A WRAPPER FOR FACEBOOK'S MOBILE SITE, IF SOMETHING BREAKS ON THE SITE, THERE ISN'T MUCH I CAN DO.**Tinfoil for Facebook is for those users that require a Tinfoil Hat when logging in to Facebook. It creates a sandbox for Facebook's mobile site in order to protect your privacy and to avoid the ability others to track your browsing history. Requires INTERNET permissions.Feel free to check the source code here: https://github.com/velazcod/Tinfoil-FacebookIt also requires the "COARSE_LOCATION" permission. This is not used unless you enable "Allow Check-ins" on the preferences, otherwise Check-ins won't work. This option is disabled by default.

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: Good and Lite only hang-up after viewing and editing cover photo still need to refresh to view how page suppose to be. Please have photo save option and let the top notification bar stay no need to press option go to top and will be perfect.
reviews.author: Mardie Suarez

reviews.title: Love It
reviews.comment: So far everything I want works. Flash plays just fine with tinfoil fb but you will have to install it from a trusted site. Yeah I can edit comments and view as mobile desktop site. Games and videos even work once adobe flash installed.
reviews.author: W White

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: More reliable than the official Facebook app. Great app with great security.
reviews.author: Caleb Leupold

reviews.title: Works, I suppose
reviews.comment: Would be great if the sidebar opened on the other side of the screen, like most other android apps. At the moment it just doesn\'t work for me as I have pie controls set up to open on that side.
reviews.author: Jake Oliver

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Back to using this sweet app, cuz Google cannot get act together for updates to stock app. Recommending to all my Android friends on Facebook. Keep up the great work. Ignore previous comment about newsfeed. Works fine.
reviews.author: Carol Burton

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Great except one simple thing: tinfoil doesn\'t automatically insert spaces when typing. You have to manually press the space button after each word. Would be great if this was fixed
reviews.author: Jaron Wilson

reviews.title: Works well, one small issue
reviews.comment: I love the app, well designed, etc. Only one small quip, the navigation drawer should follow the convention of opening on the left side. I\'ve already modified the source to do as such for my own use. Good app otherwise!
reviews.author: Billy Ryan

reviews.title: Good app BUT
reviews.comment: Freezing,  app can\'t find its way \'back\' after posting a comment or reading a news feed story!  If it does go back, it brings me to the top of FB rather than back to the area I was in and wanted to STAY in....  The LIKE button has to be pressed twice (doesn\'t \'take\' the first time)...  please fix  AND, it would be efficient and nice to be able to SAVE pictures to galary....
reviews.author: Kelli Hillman

reviews.title: Awesome...but....
reviews.comment: It\'s smooth and it does what it suppose to without taking a chunk out of my phone. Only one thing though...I used to be able to share my pictures in my gallery to facebook, but there isn\'t an option to share anymore. I switched to the LG Optimus L9 phone, if that helps any.
reviews.author: Yvonne Nottelling

reviews.title: Its Awesome ..
reviews.comment: Fast, Videos working , great interface , Simple .. Bravo to the creator .. Working brilliantly on my phone..
reviews.author: Syed Saad

reviews.title: Great app, notifications?
reviews.comment: Awesome app,  only thing is I\'m not receiving notifications.  I\'m not too sure of its just me or the app lacks that.  It would be perfect if notifications worked.
reviews.author: Adam Dixon

reviews.title: Switches between browser interface and mobile.
reviews.comment: This new version has this strange behavior: when first launched it\'s giving a wrapped version of the main FB experience. On clicking through to a specific post or photo, it switches to the mobile FB and then won\'t switch back until the app is closed then opened again. On my Nexus 7, I prefer the main FB interface as opposed to the mobile one, so this is frustrating to me. It used to always give me the main FB interface.
reviews.author: Rachel Mello

reviews.title: Bug?
reviews.comment: When I go to comment and hit back, it will put my back at the top of my news feed. I wish it was fixed! Then I have to scroll all the way down to where I was
reviews.author: Jennica Wilson

reviews.title: Allow multiple logins!
reviews.comment: Please make it so that we can log into multiple accounts or at least switch between multiple accounts with these instead of having to log out and log back into something else.
reviews.author: nirav shah

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Perfect way to enjoy FB on android. It\'s fast, and you can keep it separate from your regular browsing.  Any chance for a Google+ version?
reviews.author: Joseph Kowalski

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: The perfect solution to use Facebook on your mobile device and still having genuine Facebook experience. Thank you!  Can you also make tinfoil for twitter and linked in?
reviews.author: Zmago Fluks

reviews.title: Needs \"open in browser\" button
reviews.comment: Please bring back \"open n browser\" button. Since links open in tinfoil, some do not work well and need to be viewed in the real browser, also a copy url button would be nice.
reviews.author: Sarah Story

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great app. Fast, no weird permissions. No Facebook bloat.
reviews.author: Craig Gosling

reviews.title: Best Facebook app
reviews.comment: Loads quickly. Doesn\'t steal your phone numbers and doesn\'t freeze. Great app
reviews.author: Matthew Blackburn

reviews.title: Good job
reviews.comment: Good job .
reviews.author: Kenneth Quirante
